channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/10/2024 INC#1154

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1154; 03:56PM; 1212 S Olive St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tN8rqj; #DowntownLA; Firefighters arrived to a vacant one-story commercial with heavy smoke showing. Crews located a storage closet/structure inside the building with stored building materials on fire, which burned up through the roof in one location and damaged some large structural components. Ultimately, it took 68 firefighters 26 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR33 AR39 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E227 E26 E5 E9 E95 EM1 EM11 EM5 HE1 HR3 RA10 RA13 RA810 RA9 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T27 T3 T9 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1154; 03:30PM; 1212 S Olive St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tN8rqj; #DowntownLA; Approx 100' x 100' one-story commercial building with heavy smoke showing and one adjacent building threatened to the right of the address (delta side). Defensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E26 E5 E9 E95 EM1 EM11 EM5 HR3 RA10 RA13 RA810 RA9 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T27 T3 T9 UR5 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0117; 02:25AM; 7005 N Radford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NTCROw; #NorthHollywood; Firefighters found a one-story vacant church with smoke showing. Thirty firefighters went to work to access, confine, and extinguish the flames in less than 20 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 E102 E260 E278 E289 E60 E77 E89 RA889 RA89 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Water Rescue; INC#1132; 04:10PM; 25999 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vsqVNx; #HarborCity; LAFD responded to a water rescue to find and remove a deceased person from Machado Lake in Ken Malloy Harbor Regional Park. The victim remains at scene (no hospital transport). No other injuries reported. No further details: Media Inquiries: LAPD Harbor Division (Incident #3361) and Coroner.; FS 85; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E285 E85 EM13 RA85 T85; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0841; 01:47PM; 7321 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/41TKdqX; #SunValley; Firefighters found a single-family home, which had been converted to a (currently vacant) triplex, with smoke showing. Crews initiated an aggressive interior fire attack with a coordinated vertical (rooftop) ventilation to extinguish the flames, which took 34 firefighters 14 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 E260 E289 E60 E77 E89 EM14 RA60 RA889 RA89 SO1 T60 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0841; 01:23PM; 7321 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/41TKdqX; #SunValley; One-story home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 E260 E289 E60 E77 E89 EM14 RA60 RA889 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1459; 06:17PM; 5445 W Sierra Vista Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SbBWM4; #Hollywood; The first 24 firefighters arrived at a two-story garden-style apartment with light smoke showing. Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines and located a small oven fire, which damaged the nearest wall. It took 12 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E229 E235 E27 E35 E52 E82 EM1 RA27 RA82 T27 T29 T35; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0312; 06:51AM; 6413 N Donna Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vpt1h0; #Reseda; Firefighters found heavy fire coming from a one-story home, and performed a transitional attack (beginning the hose stream from just outside and advancing in). A total of 38 firefighters extinguished the flames in 22 minutes. no reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E100 E273 E293 E72 E73 E93 RA73 RA872 RA93 T73 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0312; 06:29AM; 6413 N Donna Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vpt1h0; #Reseda; One-story home with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E100 E273 E293 E72 E73 E93 RA73 RA872 RA93 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0809; 12:49PM; 7317 N Tyrone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/48q4dE9; #VanNuys; The first 18 firefighters to arrive quickly located burning contents, that had not yet spread to the structure itself, and rushed in with hose lines to extinguish the flames in 12 minutes from the time of alarm. Thankfully, the sole occupant and his dog both escaped unharmed, however the home was not equipped with smoke alarms. If the fire had started overnight, the outcome may have been tragic. We encourage everyone to ensure your home has functional smoke alarms. No injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 E239 E290 E39 E81 E90 RA39 RA81 RA90 SO1 T39 T90; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
